program.name: file
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; ia64*-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b," ;; *-hpux11.[01]*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +Ofltacc +Olit=all +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-hpux11*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1009,1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-linuxe*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -arch ev5 -msym -readonly_strings" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_LIBZ_LIB} \ ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBZ_LIB} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_LIBZ_INC} ${CPPFLAGS+${CPPFLAGS}}"} \ --disable-dependency-tracking --datadir=${_datadir} \ --libdir=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB} \ --mandir=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man \ --program-prefix=u \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
program.install:
gmake install pkgdatadir=${_datadir}
rm -rf ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man/man5
mv ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man/man3/ulibmagic.3 \ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man/man3/libmagic.3
mv ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man/man4/umagic.4 \ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man/man4/magic.4
